deck.name: Goblin Gang
deck.description: Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

deck.name: Three Musketeers
deck.description: Trio of powerful, independent markswomen, fighting for justice and honor. Disrespecting them would not be just a mistake, it would be a cardinal sin!

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: Elixir Collector
deck.description: You gotta spend Elixir to make Elixir.

deck.name: P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip, but packs a huge punch.

deck.name: Royal Ghost
deck.description: He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy... then he attacks! Then he's invisible again! Zzzz.

deck.name: Guards
deck.description: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. Knock off their shields and all that's left are three ruthless bone brothers.

deck.name: Goblin Hut
deck.description: Building that spawns Spear Goblins. Don't look inside... you don't want to see how they're made.

deck.name: Furnace
deck.description: The Furnace spawns two Fire Spirits at a time. It also makes great brick-oven pancakes.

deck.name: Mega Minion
deck.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
